revised_title: Noise Reduction Techniques for Road-Breaking Drills
tldr: This article discusses the sources and treatment of noise generated by road-breaking drills, focusing on pneumatic and hydraulic breakers. The authors analyze the noise reduction techniques and suggest improvements for silencing breakers while maintaining their breaking capacity. They also compare the noise levels of various unsilenced breakers and recommend manufacturers aim for a noise rating of 35 for suburban areas.
